title.narrative: KI Enhancing National Food Security in the context of CC

description.narrative: This is the PPG Phase of Kiribati Food Security Project which is being designed to build the adaptive capacity of vulnerable Kiribati communities to ensure food security under conditions of climate change.

title.narrative: Outer Island Water and Food Project

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Number of additional males benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Number of additional females benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Total number of additional people benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Total number of people above 15 years of age who acquired new jobs through a UNDP-supported project on NRM, ecosystems services, chemicals and waste

This is the PPG Phase of Kiribati Food Security Project which is being designed to build the adaptive capacity of vulnerable Kiribati communities to ensure food security under conditions of climate change.
Energy - policy, planning and administration
This project will help with capacity building for mainstreaming Multilateral Environmental Agreements (MEA) objectives into inter-ministerial structures and mechanisms

title.narrative: Integrating global environmental priorities into national policies and programmes

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Number of additional males benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Number of additional females benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Total number of additional people benefitting from livelihoods strengthened through solutions for management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste
Total number of people above 15 years of age who acquired new jobs through a UNDP-supported project on NRM, ecosystems services, chemicals and waste

To improve information management and compliance monitoring in order to achieve global environmental benefits, in accordance with the three Rio Conventions on climate change, biodiversity conservation, and desertification.
Energy - policy, planning and administration

1) Percentage of stakeholders applying Rio Convention priorities. 2) Number of policies integrating Rio Convention priorities and effectively using new environmental information. 3) Capacity development monitoring scorecard rating.

1) • 1 database review. • 1 data information protocol. • 1 technology training needs assessment.
